324850.name: Red Orchestra 2/Rising Storm Beta Community Maps
324850.description: This pack will provide a route for players to find community-made maps for Red Orchestra 2 and Rising Storm, in Beta stage of development, curated by Tripwire Interactive. The aim is to make it really easy for players wanting to have this material pre-loaded ready for whatever servers they play on. We hope it will encourage more server admins to run more of this material from the community, as it will be readily available through here (for free, of course) for players and server admins.
324850.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语*, 波兰语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 已启用 Valve 反作弊保护
